June 18, 2016 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmans-festival-class-a
Variations on a Ninth
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK March ('ORB' - Charles Anderson): 1 St. Dennis 48 2 Roche 47 3 Wantage 46 4 St. Austell 45 5 Hyde 44
Best Player: Terry Sleeman, baritone, St. Dennis
Special Awards: Best Soprano: Rob Rogers (Roche Brass) Best Solo Cornet: Kayleigh Mitchell (Roche Brass) Best Euphonium: Kimberly Bazeley (St Dennis) Best Solo Horn: Sarah Whitehead (St Dennis) Best Set of Basses: Roche Brass
A R Trudgian Youth Awards: Megan Thomas (St Austell) Gavin Rowe (St Austell)
Deportment Class: Judge: Gareth Roberts MBE
1. Okehampton Excelsior Silver 2. Shrewton Silver
Nov. 29, 2015, 1:02 a.m. June 27, 2016, 12:32 p.m.
